role: Product designer, writer and coffee geek
about: I was born and still live in the city of Criciúma, in Santa Catarina, together with my wife, my dog Amora, and my cat Figma. I've been working with product design since 2016, and I'm currently a senior at Locaweb, responsible for the KingHost dashboard and app, as well as the design system.
tools-accessories-keyboard: EPOMAKER x AULA F75 mechanical keyboard
lets-ui-description: Let’s UI is a complete, open-source multibranding design system, created to make interfaces fully fluid.
